summary: Added hamburger menu button to navbar HTML and updated CSS to ensure navbar links are visible on mobile phones. The hamburger menu button is now visible on mobile devices and toggles the navigation menu open/closed. Updated JavaScript to handle menu toggle functionality and close menu when links are clicked. Navbar links are now accessible on mobile through the hamburger menu interface.
current_status: Navbar mobile visibility issue resolved. Hamburger menu button added and functional. Navigation links are now accessible on mobile devices through the toggle menu.
